lastfm.summary: "Ça plane pour moi" is a song issued as a single in December 1977 by Plastic Bertrand. It was produced (and sang!) by Lou Deprijck. The song has the same melody as "Jet Boy, Jet Girl", recorded previously in November 1977 by Elton Motello with the same musicians. It appeared on Plastic Bertrand's 1978 album An 1. The single peaked at #47 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #8 on the UK Singles Chart. Three re-issues were released, backed with "Pogo Pogo" on the B-side (1977-78). Read more on Last.fm.
